issue.title: Several examples appear broken following recent changes

labels.name: A-Rendering
labels.description: Drawing game state to the screen

labels.name: S-Needs-Investigation
labels.description: This issue requires detective work to figure out what's going wrong

repository.name: bevy
repository.description: A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

issue.body:
The example runs shows several example regressions, per @rparrett [on Discord](https://discord.com/channels/691052431525675048/692572690833473578/1290741433870848103).

- [x] ui_texture_*,
- [x] custom_shader_instancing
- [x] asset_decompression
- [x] volumetric_fog
- [x] transparency_2d (changed, not sure if broken)

Retained rendering world #15320 or various required components changes are both plausible.

This is in addition to #15563.

body:

issue.title: Fix deferred rendering

labels.name: A-Rendering
labels.description: Drawing game state to the screen

labels.name: S-Ready-For-Final-Review
labels.description: This PR has been approved by the community. It's ready for a maintainer to consider merging it

repository.name: bevy
repository.description: A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

issue.body:
# Objective

Fixes #15525

The deferred and mesh pipelines tonemapping LUT bindings were accidentally out of sync, breaking deferred rendering.

As noted in the issue it's still broken on wasm due to hitting a texture limit.

## Solution

Add constants for these instead of hardcoding them.

## Testing

Test with `cargo run --example deferred_rendering` and see it works, run the same on main and see it crash.

rename.from: Deferred rendering example is broken on native and wasm
rename.to: Deferred rendering example is broken on web

body: Looks like everything but Forward + Prepass is fixed. Enabling Deferred + Prepass in `deferred_rendering` results in a hang (without error message) on macos/native and linux/webgl2, but not linux/native

rename.from: Deferred rendering example is broken on web
rename.to: Deferred rendering example (Deferred + Prepass) is broken on web and macos

rename.from: Deferred rendering example (Deferred + Prepass) is broken on web and macos
rename.to: Deferred rendering example (Forward + Prepass) is broken on web and macos

issue.title: Place percentage-closer soft shadows behind a feature gate to save on samplers.

labels.name: A-Rendering
labels.description: Drawing game state to the screen

labels.name: O-MacOS
labels.description: Specific to the MacOS (Apple) desktop operating system

labels.name: S-Ready-For-Final-Review
labels.description: This PR has been approved by the community. It's ready for a maintainer to consider merging it

labels.name: O-WebGL2
labels.description: Specific to the WebGL2 render API

repository.name: bevy
repository.description: A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

issue.body:
The two additional linear texture samplers that PCSS added caused us to blow past the limit on Apple Silicon macOS and WebGL. To fix the issue, this commit adds a `--feature pbr_pcss` feature gate that disables PCSS if not present.

Closes #15345.
Closes #15525.
Closes #15821.
